input.sentences: the university students were having a farewell lunch .
they discussed with each other what their plans were for after graduation .
they were all smiles as they thought about what their future was going to be .
they had an idea to take a photo together to retain the memories that they had in class together .
they all smiled and posed for the photo during their last time as a group .
output.sentences: A tan skinned woman with dark hair tilts her head to the side and smile.
A young woman with light brown hair uses hand gestures.
A woman with a paisley top stand and smile.
A blonde woman with long blonde hair looks forward and grins.
a group of teachers and students stand together to take a picture.
